Contents

  1. Data Pools

Data Pools

All data pools work on a simple key-value pair, where the key must be unique, when you set a value to a key that already exists the value is replaced with the new value.

The values attached to the keys can be numerical, strings, arrays or objects. In fact, any type that PHP supports. While it's possible to use non-string keys it is not recommended or supported.
